channel.title: Ok many troubles
channel.description:
Ok In the mist of my coding on my server source and client i somehow ruined the ability to attack anything, players or npc. Which file should i look under and what should i look up?
Also while i'm at it can anyone post me to a tut or write a quick one on how to make it so u only have attack in wild? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2009, 05:41:57 pm[/size][hr]Bit more info on problem: When i try to attack (npc or player) it does the attack follow but no striking (with or without weapon) also npc's will realize you want to attack and swing at you.

item.title: Ok many troubles

item.description:

Ok In the mist of my coding on my server source and client i somehow ruined the ability to attack anything, players or npc. Which file should i look under and what should i look up?
